overview: A former Union Army officer plans to sell out to Anchor Ranch and move east with his fianc√©e, but the low price offered by Anchor's crippled owner and the outfit's bullying tactics make him reconsider. When one of his hands is murdered he decides to stay and fight, utilizing his war experience. Not all is well at Anchor with the owner's wife carrying on with his brother who also has a Mexican woman in town.
tagline: VOLCANIC! VALIANT! VICIOUS! Violence and Passion the Screen Has Seldom Seen!
title: The Violent Men
